$the hard grounder bounced up into 3B Brooks Conrad's chest and went inside his shirt where it remained; Conrad felt it hit his chest and then could not find the baseball2010CHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
ej,riosa002,P,fleta901,Called third strike White Sox center fielder Alex Rios ejected by HP umpire Andy Fletcher2010CHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$between innings, Carlos Zambrano tossed a Gatorade cooler and got in the face of 1B Derrek Lee; apparently, Zambrano was upset that Lee did not field the ball hit by Juan Pierre to start the inning; Cubs manager Lou Piniella had to separate the two players; he told Zambrano to go home; the Cubs suspended Zambrano after the game, with GM Jim Hendry saying: 'we'll play with 24 before we tolerate that kind of behavior'; Lee was playing in with Pierre at bat in case Pierre bunted the ball2010CHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"

$Gordon Beckham moved into the plate area on his follow through and catcher Geovany Soto collided with him trying to throw out Alexei Ramirez at 2B; Beckham was called for interference and Ramirez was out; Ramirez did not believe he was out since he stole 2B successfully and it took a little coaxing from 2B umpire Paul Emmel to get Ramirez to leave the field2010CHA.EVA.regular.comment.csv"
